name: Chinese armor
description: A LoRA trained based on Anything V4.5, used to create Chinese-style armor; So far not a mature model, so the recommended LoRA weights are 0.5-0.6, and please emphasize the trigger prompt to 1.3-1.4, e.g. (wh_chi_armor:1.3)

modelVersions.name: chi_armor v1.0
modelVersions.description: recommend use with my other LoRA wh_chi_zhajia
